title: The Mancode: Exposed
description: The Mancode: Exposed is an essay collection about men and women, sex and chocolate. An Amazon Top 100 bestseller and #1 on both the Marriage and Parenting and Family lists, The Mancode: Exposed is leaving a mark. Author Rachel Thompson writes about the Mancode and Chickspeak in this newest companion to A Walk in the Snark. A humorous take on family relationships or love and romance. If you want unicorns and rainbows, go somewhere else.
author: Rachel  Thompson
